name: Fortune Venture Investment Group
description: venture capital and private equity firm
overview: Fortune Venture Investment Group (FVIG) is an independent venture capital and private equity firm, specializing in venture capital fund management. FVIG provides start-up/early stage financing, expansion/development capital, mezzanine/bridge finance to small to medium sized enterprises in the hi-tech industries (information technology, telecommunications, electronics), and considers investments in high growth sectors, computer related, light and medical manufacturing sectors in the United States, Southeast and Far-East Asia. The firm invests a minimum of $1 million to a maximum of $5 million, with an average investment size of $2-3 million, in exchange for minority equity stakes and a monitoring role. FVIG requires a seat on the Board of its investee and offers strategic, financial, management advice, and deal sourcing. FVIG conducts one to two lead investments per year. Fortune Venture Investment Group has formed a strategic alliance with the Sino Tech Group to invest in high-technology firms in Greater China.
